text: The flag of Ecatepec de Morelos () It is colored white and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Related pages== * Ecatepec de Morelos Municipality ==References== Ecatepec de Morelos Category:Ecatepec de Morelos Ecatepec de Morelos Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Ecatepec de Morelos
